system.description:
Your combat skills and psychic power are fully integrated. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Strength, Dexterity, or Intelligence increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • Half your fighter levels count as esper levels for the purpose of the Psychic Crush feature.
  • While you are psionically-focused, you can spend 2 points of exertion and roll two psi dice as a bonus action to gain the effects of the warrior’s instincts spell. As long as you maintain your psionic focus, you count as concentrating on the spell.
  • If you spend a fighter hit die to regain a psi die, you regain hit points equal to 1d4 + your Constitution modifier.
